MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CW9 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Great Budworth, Comberbach and the surrounding area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out brief emergency shutdowns between the hours of 9:30 am and 11:00 am to remove generators from the network and restore properties to mains power. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect all power to be restored by 11:00 am. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:10 am on 19th February, 2021.
